exits.description: <color=purple>there is a cave ahead. surely they went in there. you must find them.</color>

description: <color=purple>there is a cave ahead. surely they went in there. you must find them.</color> Ohm lies still on the rocks behind you. rain runs over their staring eyes. <color=purple>they will be fine. leave them for now.</color>
investigationDescription: <color=purple>DELAY NO</color>snapped off the leg, trapped and screaming<color=purple>LONGER. THE CAVE.</color>

exits.description: you arrive at the cave that Ohm entered. you must find them.

description: <color=purple>they are not far ahead. you can still reclaim the orb. join them.</color>
